entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Kincardine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:04 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
